title: Cannot connect to Chat
body:
So all of a sudden, I am unable to connect to chat.  I have a perfect internet connection, and I am able to stream videos and play other online games with no issues. I am even able to play league with no issues as well, but my friends do not show me as online. I downloaded the network diagnostics bat file and let it do its thing. I have already flushed the dns as well.  Please help

replies.body: We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]
I have the same issue. i have not run the diagnostic, but I can download it as well if it would help.
